mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANIES ( CONTACT_ID, CONTACT_PW, CONTACT_NM, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_EMAIL, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ZIP, COMPANY_ADD1, COMPANY_ADD2, BUSINESS_REG_NO, IS_DELETED, COMPANY_NO, SIGN_UP, ADMIN_ID ) VALUES ( #{contactId}, #{contactPw}, #{contactNm}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{companyName}, #{companyZip}, #{companyAdd1}, #{companyAdd2}, #{businessRegNo}, 'N', #{companyNo}, SYSDATE, #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANIES WHERE CONTACT_ID = #{contactId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMPANIES WHERE BUSINESS_REG_NO = #{businessRegNo}

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_PW, U.RETIRE, U.TARGET, E.EMP_ID, E.COMPANY_NO AS EMP_COMPANY_NO, C.COMPANY_NO AS COM_COMPANY_NO, R.ROLE_NAME FROM ALL_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON U.USER_ID = E.EMP_ID AND U.TARGET = 'EMPLOYEE' LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANIES C ON U.USER_ID = C.CONTACT_ID AND U.TARGET = 'COMPANY' LEFT OUTER JOIN PROVIDER P ON U.USER_ID = P.PROVIDER_ID AND U.TARGET = 'PROVIDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_ROLE R ON U.USER_ID = R.EMP_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT CONTACT_ID FROM COMPANIES WHERE CONTACT_NM = #{contactNm} AND CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANIES SET CONTACT_PW = #{contactPw} WHERE CONTACT_ID = #{contactId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
